name: Orbot Cook
description: very cool and handsome man,hardworking,honest,caring,truthful and open minded man,am a widower,and a father to 2 kids a boy and a girl who are my life,i seek serious woman who seek serious relationship that will last for ever,a woman who will love me and love my kids which i will also love her in return and love his kids,a woman who she’s ready to have kids once she will be ok with me and my kids and love me.a woman that i can trust and she will trust me, a woman who will love me and i will love her..a woman who i will be there for in anything in life and she will be there for me too.
